extracted_information: Konten web adalah halaman GitHub untuk repositori 'bps-pinrang/Web-API-BPS-Postman-Collection'. Repositori ini menyediakan koleksi Postman untuk Web API Badan Pusat Statistik Republik Indonesia. Halaman ini berisi deskripsi koleksi, tautan ke dokumentasi resmi API BPS, dan panduan cara menggunakan koleksi Postman tersebut.

PostmanCollection.description: This is a Postman Collection of Web API Badan Pusat Statistik Republik Indonesia.
guide_to_use: Clone this repo or download API BPS.postman_collection.json file.
Open Postman app, go to collection panel and click Import.
Set your API KEY in Variables panel (refer to official documentation on how to get an API Key).
Replace DOMAIN_VALUE variable with your desired domain (2 digits Province Code or 4 digits Regency Code).
Refer to https://sig.bps.go.id/bridging-kode/index for a full list of domains.

API_Information.endpoints_and_parameters_details: Details regarding specific endpoints and their parameters are expected to be found within the imported Postman collection file (API BPS.postman_collection.json) and the official documentation linked above.
